LanguageData.TM_NotEnoughMana: {0} needs more mana to cast this spell.
LanguageData.TM_NotEnoughStamina: {0} does not have enough stamina to execute this ability.
LanguageData.TM_InvalidTarget: {0} found no valid target for ability {1}.
LanguageData.InvalidPortal: Invalid portal location - target position, and all adjacent positions, must be valid and free of debris.
LanguageData.InvalidMine: Invalid summoned mine location - target position must be valid and free of debris.
LanguageData.InvalidSummon: Attempted a summoning at an invalid location - target position must be valid and free of debris.
LanguageData.PylonDeSpawn: Mana cohesion holding a defensive pylon together has expired and the pylon has dissolved.
LanguageData.MineDeSpawn: Mana cohesion holding a mana mine together has deteriorated and the mana mine has safely dissolved.
LanguageData.MinionFled: One of your minions has fled back to its plane of existence.
LanguageData.NotArcaneBook: Book type not recognized as arcane script!
LanguageData.NotGiftedPawn: {0} does not have the Magically Gifted trait and cannot make use of this item.
LanguageData.NotCombatBook: Book type not recognized as a combat form!
LanguageData.NotPhyAdeptPawn: Pawn does not possess the Physically Adept trait and cannot learn this combat form.
LanguageData.CannotLearnSpell: Spell cannot be applied to this pawn.
LanguageData.CannotLearnSkill: Skill cannot be applied to this pawn.
LanguageData.NotMageToLearnSpell: Pawn is not attuned to with arcane forces and cannot learn the contents of this scroll.
LanguageData.NotFighterToLearnSkill: Pawn is not trained in a combat form and cannot apply the techniques from this scroll.
LanguageData.InvalidBattery: The spell failed, could not detect a common ground with the building (not a battery).
LanguageData.NotABuilding: Spell failed: target was not a building.
LanguageData.NotRightTerrainType: Unable to transform this type of land.
LanguageData.TerraformNotSandOrGravel: Unable to transform land, must be sand or gravel.
LanguageData.MustHaveRangedWeapon: {0} does not have a valid ranged weapon equipped. {0} must equip a ranged weapon to use this skill.
LanguageData.MustHaveGunpowderWeapon: {0} does not have a valid ranged weapon equipped. {0} must equip a more advanced weapon to use this skill.
LanguageData.MustHaveMeleeWeapon: {0} does not have a valid melee weapon equipped. {0} must equip a melee weapon to use this skill.
LanguageData.TM_ShieldBlockingPowers: {0} must unequip {1} to use this ability.
LanguageData.TM_OutOfRange: Target location is out of range.
LanguageData.TM_OutOfLOS: Ability failed, target was not visible to {0}.
LanguageData.TM_NothingToRegenerate: No valid target found for Regeneration.
LanguageData.TM_CureDiseaseTypeFail: Unable to cure this type of disease.
LanguageData.TM_UndeadCollapsed: {0} does not have the mana to sustain {1}. {1} has disintegrated into mana to replenish {0}.
LanguageData.TM_CannotUseOnLiving: This spell cannot be used on the living.
LanguageData.TM_CannontConsumeCorpseType: Cannot consume this type of corpse.
LanguageData.TM_InvalidCorpseType: Corpse type is invalid for Consume Corpse.
LanguageData.TM_GatewayBeyondMaximumRange: Target tile is beyond reach of Gateway.
LanguageData.TM_InvalidGatewayNotOccupied: Gateway can only be used on map tiles occupied by colonists.
LanguageData.TM_Exception: An exception has been throw by {0} while trying to cast {1} - restoring mana and exiting ability attempt.
LanguageData.TM_ExceptionClose: An exception has been thrown while trying to close {0} - ending ability.
LanguageData.TM_ExceptionTick: An exception has been thrown during {0} - ending ability immediately.
LanguageData.TM_InvalidResurrection: {0} was unable to find a valid target for Resurrection.
LanguageData.TM_ResurrectionTargetExpired: Resurrection cannot restore this body, it has expired and can no longer sustain life.
LanguageData.MustHaveBow: {0} is armed with a {1}, {0} must use a bow to use this ability.
LanguageData.TM_BondedAnimalRelease: The bond between {0} and {1} has ended and {0} has disappeared into the wild.
LanguageData.TM_AnimalIncapableOfBond: {0} does not have the intelligence to form a bond with {1}.
LanguageData.TM_FailedRangerBond: {1} has failed to bond with {0} - {2}% chance
LanguageData.TM_RangerNotExperienced: {1} is unable to establish a bond with {0} at this empathy level. Raise empathy by investing points in "Animal Empathy".
LanguageData.TM_TooManyTraps: {0} is limited to {1} traps, removing oldest trap.
LanguageData.TM_SummonedCreatureLimitExceeded: {0} has exceeded the max number of summoned creatures, dismissing oldest summon.
LanguageData.TM_NoValidUndeadToDismiss: Target is not a valid target for dismiss undead.
LanguageData.TM_CannotUseGemOfInsight: {0} already possesses an arcane or combat trait and cannot make use of this gemstone.
LanguageData.TM_ItemUseFailed: Attempted to use an item and failed, reason: {0}
LanguageData.TM_SunlightCollapse: A sun light has collapsed, {0} was unable to sustain it.
LanguageData.TM_NotSocialCapable: {0} is incapable of social activity and cannot become a bard.
LanguageData.LetterRegrowthSurgeryFail:
{0} just attempted to perform {1} on {2} but failed because {4} {3}.

In order successfully perform this surgery, the following conditions must be met:

1. Surgeon must be a trained Druid
2. The druid must have learned the Regrow Limb spell.
3. You must have a Seed of Life as an ingredient to perform the surgery.
4. The druid must have 90% or more mana at the time of the surgery.
5. After all these conditions are met, the druid must still perform the surgery successfully, which depends on their medical skill.

Good luck, mage!
LanguageData.TM_NoRegrowthSpell: has not learned the spell Regrow Limb
LanguageData.TM_InsufficientManaForSurgery: did not have enough mana to complete the operation - 90% or greater is required
LanguageData.showAbilitiesOnMultiSelect: Show abilities when selecting multiple pawns
LanguageData.TM_global_regen_pwr_desc: Increases the rate mana is recovered by 5% per level.
LanguageData.TM_global_eff_pwr_desc: Decreases the mana cost of all abilities by an additional 2.5% per level.
LanguageData.TM_global_spirit_pwr_desc: Increase maximum mana by 2% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_global_refresh_pwr_desc: Increases the rate stamina is recovered by 5% per level.
LanguageData.TM_global_seff_pwr_desc: Decreases the stamina cost of all abilities by an additional 3% per level.
LanguageData.TM_global_strength_pwr_desc: Increases the damage of combat abilities by 5% per level.
LanguageData.TM_global_endurance_pwr_desc: Increases maximum stamina by 2% per level.
LanguageData.TM_RayofHope_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Ray of Hope by 8% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Firebolt_pwr_desc: Increases Firebolt damage by 5 per level.
LanguageData.TM_Firebolt_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Firebolt by 10% per level.
LanguageData.TM_Fireclaw_pwr_desc: Increases damage done by each strand of Fireclaw by 4 per skill level. Level 1: 4 Level 2: 8 Level 3: 12
LanguageData.TM_Fireclaw_eff_desc: Decrease mana cost by 10% per level.
LanguageData.TM_Fireclaw_ver_desc: Adds additional claws at levels 1 and 2, expands claw strike radius at level 3.
LanguageData.TM_Fireball_pwr_desc: Increases the number of secondary explosions by 3 per level.
LanguageData.TM_Fireball_eff_desc: Decrease mana cost by 10% per level.
LanguageData.TM_Fireball_ver_desc: Fireball causes Terror at level 1; levels 2 and 3 increase Terror potency. Terror lowers the enemies ability to fight effectively and may cause them to flee in panic.
LanguageData.TM_Firestorm_pwr_desc: Increases the frequency of all meteor types. Increases Firestorm radius by .25 per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Firestorm_eff_desc: Decrease mana cost by 5% per level.
LanguageData.TM_Firestorm_ver_desc: Increases the duration of Firestorm by 1 second per skill level. Increases Firestorm radius by .25 per skill level. Increases amount of shrapnel create by meteor impacts.
LanguageData.TM_Soothe_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Soothe by 8% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Rainmaker_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Rainmaker by 15% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Icebolt_pwr_desc: Increases lethality of Icebolt by pre-fragmenting the bolt into razor sharp shards. Shards deal 6 damage per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Icebolt_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Icebolt by 8% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Icebolt_ver_desc: Increases the compression and size of Icebolt, causing more fragments upon impact (level*(1-6)).
LanguageData.TM_FrostRay_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Frost Ray by 8% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Snowball_pwr_desc: Increases the size of the Snowball, causing an increase in impact area by .7 cells per level and increases damage up to 3 per level.
LanguageData.TM_Snowball_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Snowball by 8% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Snowball_ver_desc: Increases the compression of Snowball which amplifies the number and force of secondary fragments that are thrown nearby the impact point. Level 0: None Level 1: 4 fragments Level 2: 8 fragments Level 3: 12 fragments
LanguageData.TM_Blizzard_pwr_desc: Increases the frequency of iceshards and snowballs. Increases the radius of blizzard by .5 per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Blizzard_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Blizzard by 8% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Blizzard_ver_desc: Increases the duration of blizzard by 1.5 seconds per level. Increases the radius of blizzard by .5 per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_AMP_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of AMP by 10% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_LightningBolt_pwr_desc: Increases raw damage of Lightning Bolt by 6 per level.
LanguageData.TM_LightningBolt_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Lightning Bolt by 8% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_LightningBolt_ver_desc: Increases the possibility of secondary lightning strikes by 1 to 4 per level.
LanguageData.TM_LightningCloud_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Lightning Cloud by 6% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_LightningCloud_pwr_desc: Increases the shock damage of Lightning Cloud by 1 per level.
LanguageData.TM_LightningCloud_ver_desc: Increases duration of Lightning Cloud by 2 seconds per level.
LanguageData.TM_LightningStorm_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Lightning Storm by 6% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_LightningStorm_pwr_desc: Increases the frequency of lightning strikes by 20% per level and slightly increases the damage of each strike.
LanguageData.TM_LightningStorm_ver_desc: Increases duration of Lightning Storm by 1s per level and expands the area of effect.
LanguageData.TM_EyeOfTheStorm_eff_desc: Uses energy in the atmosphere to fuel creation of the storm. Reduces mana cost by 5% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_EyeOfTheStorm_pwr_desc: Increases the frequency the eye's lightning strikes by 20% per level and increases the damage of each strike by 20%.
LanguageData.TM_EyeOfTheStorm_ver_desc: Expands the strike radius by 1 for each skill level. Base radius is 5.
LanguageData.TM_Shadow_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Shadow by 8% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Blink_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Blink by 10% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Summon_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Summon by 10% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_MagicMissile_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Magic Missile by 8% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Teleport_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Teleport by 10% per level of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Teleport_pwr_desc: Draws more energy into the teleporter, allowing 33% further travel distance per level. Allows the portal to be held open 20s longer per level.
LanguageData.TM_Teleport_ver_desc: Refines the transport process, adding 400 transportation capacity per skill level, 600 at level 3. Allows the portal to be held open 20s longer per level.
LanguageData.TM_FoldReality_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost to Fold Reality by 6% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Heal_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Heal by 7% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Heal_pwr_desc: Increases the amount each wound is healed by 3 points per level.
LanguageData.TM_Heal_ver_desc: Increases the maximum number of wounds that can be healed per spell by 1 per level.
LanguageData.TM_Shield_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Shield by 8% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_ValiantCharge_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Valiant Charge by 8% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_ValiantCharge_pwr_desc: Increases damage of Valiant Charge by 1 to 4 per level.
LanguageData.TM_ValiantCharge_ver_desc: Increase the force of impact, expanding the size of impact and amount of debris. Can stun at level 2.
LanguageData.TM_Overwhelm_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Overwhelm by 10% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_Overwhelm_ver_desc: Summons more powerful symbols at level 1 and 3. Overwhelm can stun at level 2 and improved stun at level 3.
LanguageData.TM_HolyWrath_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost of Holy Wrath by 5% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_HolyWrath_pwr_desc: Requires 2 ability points per skill level. Increases number of strikes by 1 per skill level. Base number of strikes is 3.
LanguageData.TM_HolyWrath_ver_desc: Requires 2 ability points per skill level. Level 1: allies within the field of Holy Wrath become temporarily invulnerable Level 2: allies are healed for a small amount Level 3: Holy Wrath bestows might to all allies within the effect
LanguageData.TM_SummonMinion_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost to summon minions by 10% of base mana cost. Also reduces upkeep cost by 10%.
LanguageData.TM_SummonMinion_pwr_desc: Increases the number or power of minions summoned. Level 0: summons one minion. Level 1: summons two minions. Level 2: summons one greater minion. Level 3: summons two greater minions.
LanguageData.TM_SummonMinion_ver_desc: Increases the duration of the summoning by 10m per skill point. Base duration is 20m.
LanguageData.TM_SummonPylon_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost to summon a defensive pylon by 8% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_SummonPylon_pwr_desc: Increases the range and power of the defensive pylon created.
LanguageData.TM_SummonPylon_ver_desc: Increases the duration of the summoning by 1m per skill point. Base duration is 2m.
LanguageData.TM_SummonExplosive_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost to create a mana mine by 8% of per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_SummonExplosive_pwr_desc: Increases the power of the mine by 20% per skill level. Increases explosion radius by 20% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_SummonExplosive_ver_desc: Increases the duration the mana mine remains stable by 1m per skill point. Base duration is 2m. Mana mine will harmlessly dissolve if the timer expires.
LanguageData.TM_SummonElemental_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost to summon an elemental by 6% of base mana cost.
LanguageData.TM_SummonElemental_pwr_desc: Increases the power of the elemental summoned. At rank 3: summons two lesser elementals to accompany your primary summon.
LanguageData.TM_SummonElemental_ver_desc: Increases the duration of the summoning by 15s per skill point. Base duration is 30s.
LanguageData.TM_SummonPoppi_eff_desc: Decreases mana cost to summon a band of poppi by 5% each skill point, but really, who can put a price on happiness?
LanguageData.TM_SummonPoppi_pwr_desc: Even more poppi, snuggles for everyone.
LanguageData.TM_SummonPoppi_ver_desc: Hanging out with those poppi is even more of a blast.
LanguageData.TM_Poison_eff_desc: Reduces the cost of Poison by 10% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Poison_pwr_desc: Increases the potency of poison, dealing 25% more per skill level for each square the victim moves.
LanguageData.TM_Poison_ver_desc: Increases the minimum and maximum severity levels of poison. Severity levels cause reduction in fighting and moving capacities. Also increases duration of poison by 10% per level. Level 0: (10%-40%), Duration 45s Level 1: (20%-60%), Duration 49.5s Level 2: (30%-80%), Duration 54s Level 3: (40%-80%), Duration 58.5s
LanguageData.TM_SootheAnimal_eff_desc: Reduces the cost of Beguile Animal by 8% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_SootheAnimal_pwr_desc: Animals will receive arcane buffs when enraged, and arcane debuffs when pacified. Skill level determines the strength of these modifiers, no modifiers occur at skill level 0.
LanguageData.TM_Regenerate_eff_desc: Reduces the cost of Regeneration by 7% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Regenerate_pwr_desc: Increases the amount regeneration heals each tick by 1 health per level. Base regeneration is 2 health.
LanguageData.TM_Regenerate_ver_desc: Increases the duration of regeneration per skill level, duration is random between stated values: Level 0: 16s - 50s Level 1: 33s - 100s Level 2: 50s - 150s Level 3: 67s - 200s
LanguageData.TM_CureDisease_eff_desc: Reduces the cost of Cure Disease by 10% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_CureDisease_pwr_desc: Improves the effectiveness of Cure Disease. The higher the skill level, the more likely the spell cures the disease instead of reducing it. Level 0: 50% chance to fail; reduces severity of disease by 1 if successful. Level 1: Always succeeds; 20% chance to reduce severity by 2. Level 2: 75% chance to reduce severity by 2. Level 3: 66% chance to reduce severity by 2, 33% chance to reduce severity by 3.
LanguageData.TM_CureDisease_ver_desc: Study of diseases allows the druid to cure more advanced maladies. Level 0: Flu and Wound Infections Level 1: Gut Worms and Malaria Level 2: Sleeping Sickness and Muscle Parasites Level 3: The Plague
LanguageData.TM_RegrowLimb_eff_desc: Reduces the mana required to regrow limbs (surgery) by 6% per skill level. Regrowth is unaffected by global mana cost reductions.
LanguageData.TM_RaiseUndead_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Raise Undead by 5% per skill level. Reduces cost to maintain undead by 10% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_RaiseUndead_pwr_desc: Increases the number of undead that can be created with each spell by 1 per skill level. Level 0: 2 Level 1: 3 Level 2: 4 Level 3: 5
LanguageData.TM_RaiseUndead_ver_desc: Undead movement and action speed increases by 5% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_DeathMark_ver_desc: Death Mark can cause terror and berserk afflictions. Each skill point increases the chance to apply an additional affliction by 10%.
LanguageData.TM_DeathMark_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Death Mark by 8% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_DeathMark_pwr_desc: Increases the severity of Death Mark by 50% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_FogOfTorment_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Fog of Torment by 8% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_FogOfTorment_pwr_desc: Increases damage and penalties caused by fog of torment by 33% per skill level. Also increases the amount undead are healed by 50% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_FogOfTorment_ver_desc: Increases the duration, reduces time between effects, and expands the radius of Fog of Torment. Level 0: radius 6, effect/3s, duration 30s Level 1: radius 7, effect/2.7s, duration 33s Level 2: radius 8, effect/2.4s, duration 36s Level 3: radius 9, effect/2.1s, duration 39s
LanguageData.TM_ConsumeCorpse_eff_desc: Increases mana restored by Consume Corpse by 7% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_ConsumeCorpse_ver_desc: Consume corpse also heals the physical wounds of the caster. The amount of health varies based on type (human or animal) and freshness of the corpse or undead being consumed.
LanguageData.TM_CorpseExplosion_pwr_desc: Increases the damage of Corpse Explosion by 5 per skill level. Also increases the explosion radius by 10%. Level 0: 18-30 Level 1: 23-35 Level 2: 28-40 Level 3: 32-45
LanguageData.TM_CorpseExplosion_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Corpse Explosion by 8% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_CorpseExplosion_ver_desc: Reduces explosion delay by 1s per skill point. Also increases the explosion radius by 10%.
LanguageData.TM_DeathBolt_pwr_desc: Increases the damage of Death Bolt by 5 per skill level and Spreading Darkness by 3 per skill level. Level 0: 18-35; Spreading Darkness: 12-24 Level 1: 23-40; Spreading Darkness: 15-27 Level 2: 28-45; Spreading Darkness: 18-30 Level 3: 33-50; Spreading Darkness: 21-33
LanguageData.TM_DeathBolt_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Death Bolt by 6% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_DeathBolt_ver_desc: Darkness spreads further from the point of impact.
LanguageData.TM_AdvancedHeal_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Advanced Heal by 8% per level.
LanguageData.TM_AdvancedHeal_ver_desc: Increases the maximum number of wounds healed by 1 per level.
LanguageData.TM_AdvancedHeal_pwr_desc: Increases the amount each wound is healed by 5 points per level.
LanguageData.TM_Purify_eff_desc: Reduces the mana cost of Purify by 7% per level.
LanguageData.TM_Purify_ver_desc: Increases number of ailments that can be cured per use. Skill increase expands the types of ailments that can be purified: Level 0: Physical - Cataracts, Hearing Loss, Toxic buildup Drug Addictions - Smokeleaf, Alcohol Level 1: Physical - Blindness, Asthma, Cirrhosis, Moderate chemical damage Drug Addictions - Go-Juice, WakeUp Level 2: Physical - Frailty, Bad back, Carcinoma, Severe chemical damage Drug - Psychite Level 3: Physical - Brain and Heart conditions Drug - Any addiction including Luciferium
LanguageData.TM_Purify_pwr_desc:
Increases effectiveness of Purify. Scars are healed by 2 points + 2x skill level; Brain injuries require a skill level of 1 or greater and heals 1 point per skill level.

 Physical conditions such as blindness or carcinoma are healed or reduced, depending on skill level. If the power of purify is not enough to cure the condition outright, multiple uses of purify can be used to reduce, then cure the condition.

 Each skill point increases the effectiveness in overcoming a drug addiction; may require multiple uses to completely overcome an addiction.
LanguageData.TM_HealingCircle_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Healing Circle by 7% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_HealingCircle_ver_desc: Increases number of injuries that can be healed per wave. Also increases the duration of Healing Circle by 3s per skill point. Level 0: 1 injury Level 1: 2 injuries Level 2: 3 injuries Level 3: 4 injuries
LanguageData.TM_HealingCircle_pwr_desc: Increases amount each wound is healed. Also increases the duration of Healing Circle by 3s per skill point. Level 0: 4 health Level 1: 6 health Level 2: 8 health Level 3: 10 health
LanguageData.TM_BestowMight_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Bestow Might by 8% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_Resurrection_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Resurrection by 5% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Resurrection_ver_desc: Increases the chance to prevent resurrection side effects such as blindness and psychosis by 33% per level. Base chance is 0%.
LanguageData.TM_BardTraining_pwr_desc: Advances the Bard trait to the next level. Entertainer -> Performer -> Minstrel -> Bard. Requires 2 points to train.
LanguageData.TM_Entertain_ver_desc: Increases the chance to have favorable conversations with other colonists.
LanguageData.TM_Entertain_pwr_desc: Increases how often the bard is willing to have social interaction.
LanguageData.TM_Inspire_ver_desc: The bard learns new ways to inspire colonists. Level 0: may cause common inspirations Level 1: may cause resource frenzy inspirations Level 2: may cause learning and social inspirations Level 3: may cause heroic inspirations for magic or might classes.
LanguageData.TM_Inspire_pwr_desc: Increases how likely often the bard will attempt to inspire fellow colonists.
LanguageData.TM_Lullaby_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost of Lullaby by 8% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_Lullaby_pwr_desc: Increases chance lullaby is effective by 10% per skill point. Level 0: 40% Level 1: 50% Level 2: 60% Level 3: 70%
LanguageData.TM_Lullaby_ver_desc: Lullaby reduces the consciousness of effected pawns - works even if lullaby was resisted. Level 0: N/A Level 1: -10% consciousness Level 2: -15% consciousness Level 3: -20% consciousness
LanguageData.TM_BattleHymn_eff_desc: Reduces mana cost to use and maintain Battle Hymn by 6% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_BattleHymn_ver_desc: Increases range of battle hymn by 2m per skill point (base 11m). Also increases the tempo of battle hymn by .5s (5s base).
LanguageData.TM_BattleHymn_pwr_desc: Increases the effects of battle hymn 12% per skill point for each verse (iteration) it remains active.
LanguageData.TM_Sprint_eff_desc: Reduces the stamina cost required to sustain Sprint by 10% (of Sprint's sustained cost) per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Sprint_pwr_desc: Increases the speed of sprint but also increases physical drain. Level 0: speed +30%, tiredness +40% Level 1: speed +40%, tiredness +45% Level 2: speed +50%, tiredness +50% Level 3: speed +60%, tiredness +55%
LanguageData.TM_Fortitude_pwr_desc: Increases the amount of damage mitigation by 2 per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Fortitude_ver_desc: Increases damage to stamina conversion by .2% per level. Conversion occurs pre mitigation. Base conversion rate is .5% stamina for 1 damage.
LanguageData.TM_Grapple_eff_desc: Decreases stamina cost of Grapple by 10% per level of base stamina cost.
LanguageData.TM_Cleave_eff_desc: Decreases stamina Cleave consumes when it triggers by 10% of base stamina cost.
LanguageData.TM_Cleave_pwr_desc: Cleave hits enemies near the target based on a percentage of the original damage done to the target. Level 0: 35% Level 1: 40% Level 2: 45% Level 3: 50%
LanguageData.TM_Cleave_ver_desc: Increases chance for cleave to double-strike by 15% per level. Base chance is 0%.
LanguageData.TM_Whirlwind_pwr_desc: Increases Whirlwind damage based on weapon quality.
LanguageData.TM_Whirlwind_eff_desc: Decreases stamina cost of Whirlwind by 15% of base cost per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Whirlwind_ver_desc: Adds a chance to knockdown enemies by 5% (per hit) for each skill level. Base chance is 0%.
LanguageData.TM_SniperFocus_pwr_desc: Advances training as a Sniper. Each level requires 2 skill points to train. Level 0: Accuracy +3, Aiming delay -10%, Movement +10% Level 1: Accuracy +7, Aiming delay -15%, Movement +15% Level 2: Accuracy +11, Aiming delay -22%, Movement +20% Level 3: Accuracy +15, Aiming delay -30%, Movement +25%
LanguageData.TM_DisablingShot_eff_desc: Decreases the stamina cost of Disabling Shot by 10% per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_DisablingShot_ver_desc: Disabling rounds now double as a tranquilizer by include fast acting sedatives that significantly slow movement speed after the target recovers from the shot. Through trial and error and research (mostly trial and error) the sniper learns the right dose for this sedative. Level 0: No sedative Level 1: 10-15s (weak) Level 2: 20-25s (moderate) Level 3: 30-45s (strong)
LanguageData.TM_Headshot_pwr_desc: Improved ammo increases the velocity of rounds, resulting in greater likelihood of destroying a vital organ. Headshot gains 10% damage per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_Headshot_eff_desc: Decreases stamina cost of Headshot by 10% of base cost per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Headshot_ver_desc: The sniper gains a burst of adrenaline that restores some stamina each time headshot kills a target. Level 0: None Level 1: 10% stamina restored Level 2: 20% stamina restored Level 3: 30% stamina restored
LanguageData.TM_AntiArmor_pwr_desc: Improves the nanites used in Anti Armor rounds, increasing damage to armored targets by an additional 50% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_AntiArmor_eff_desc: Decreases stamina cost of Anti Armor by 10% of base cost per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_AntiArmor_ver_desc: Increases the number and power of fragments caused by explosive rounds. Rounds do not explode if the target is not armored.
LanguageData.TM_BladeFocus_pwr_desc: Advances training as a bladedancer. Each level requires 2 skill points to train and upgrades the class trait. Level 0: Melee Hit Chance +3, Movement +0.15, Mental Break Threshold -3% Level 1: Melee Hit Chance +6, Movement +0.20, Mental Break Threshold -5% Level 2: Melee Hit Chance +10, Movement +0.30, Mental Break Threshold -8%, Pain Threshold +5% Level 3: Melee Hit Chance +15, Movement +0.40, Mental Break Threshold -10%, Pain Threshold +10%
LanguageData.TM_BladeArt_pwr_desc: Improves mastery over the body. Each level requires 2 skill points to train. Level 0: Movement +10%, Manipulation +10% Level 1: Movement +15%, Manipulation +15% Level 2: Movement +20%, Manipulation +20%, Breathing +10% Level 3: Movement +25%, Manipulation +25%, Breathing +15%, Blood Circulation +10%
LanguageData.TM_SeismicSlash_pwr_desc: Increases the damage of Seismic Slash by 10% per level.
LanguageData.TM_SeismicSlash_eff_desc: Decreases the stamina cost of Seismic Slash by 10% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_SeismicSlash_ver_desc: Increases the number of strikes adjacent to the strike line by 2 per level. Base level checks 2 adjacent squares, max level will check all 8 adjacent squares. If nothing is occupying the square, the adjacent strike his nothing.
LanguageData.TM_BladeSpin_pwr_desc: Increases the number of strikes by 1 per skill level. Base number of strikes is 2. Increases the hit chance of Blade Spin by 4% per level. Base is 50%.
LanguageData.TM_BladeSpin_eff_desc: Decreases the stamina cost of Blade Spin by 10% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_BladeSpin_ver_desc: Increases the radius of Blade Spin by .5 squares per skill level. Base radius is 2 squares. Increases the hit chance of Blade Spin by 4% per level. Base is 50%.
LanguageData.TM_PhaseStrike_pwr_desc: Increases chance to critical strike by 15% per skill level. Base chance is 10%. Critical strikes deal 3x damage.
LanguageData.TM_PhaseStrike_eff_desc: Decreases the stamina cost of Phase Strike by 8% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_PhaseStrike_ver_desc: Increases the radius of phased strike by .5 squares per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_RangerTraining_pwr_desc: Advances training as a ranger. Each level requires 2 skill points to train and upgrades the class trait. Level 0: Move Speed +0.2c/s, Immunity +20%, Temperature comfort +-10, Aiming Delay -15% Level 1: Move Speed +0.3c/s, Immunity +30%, Temperature comfort +-15, Aiming Delay -20% Level 2: Move Speed +0.4c/s, Immunity +40%, Temperature comfort +-20, Aiming Delay -30% Level 3: Move Speed +0.5c/s, Immunity +50%, Temperature comfort +-25, Aiming Delay -40%
LanguageData.TM_BowTraining_pwr_desc: Increases skill in bows. Each level requires 2 skill points to train. Level 0: +20% damage w/ bows, +20% Sight, +20% Hearing Level 1: +40% damage w/ bows, +40% Sight, +40% Hearing Level 2: +60% damage w/ bows, +60% Sight, +60% Hearing, +15% Breathing Level 3: +80% damage w/ bows, +80% Sight, +80% Hearing, +25% Breathing, +10% Blood filtration
LanguageData.TM_PoisonTrap_ver_desc: Increases the number of active traps the ranger can have by 1 per level. Base maximum is 2.
LanguageData.TM_AnimalFriend_pwr_desc: The ranger can bond with an animal if they have an empathy level that exceeds the wildness of the animal. Empathy also increases the chance of bonding with an animal.
LanguageData.TM_AnimalFriend_eff_desc: Decreases the stamina cost of Animal Bond by 15% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_AnimalFriend_ver_desc: Increases the power of the bond between the ranger and animal kin. Level 0: Moving +20%, Manipulation +20%, Dodge chance +15% Level 1: Moving +30%, Manipulation +30%, Blood pumping +20%, Dodge chance +20% Level 2: Moving +40%, Manipulation +40%, Blood pumping +30%, Dodge chance +27% Level 3: Moving +50%, Manipulation +50%, Blood pumping +40%, Dodge chance +35%
LanguageData.TM_ArrowStorm_pwr_desc: Increases the damage of each arrow by 10% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_ArrowStorm_eff_desc: Decreases the stamina cost of Arrow Storm by 8% per skill point.
LanguageData.TM_ArrowStorm_ver_desc: Increases the accuracy of Arrow Storm by 5% per skill level. This is additive, so if the accuracy is 60%, 2 skill levels would increase the accuracy to 70%. Accuracy is derived from the accuracy of the equipped bow.
LanguageData.TM_MagicXPDesc: Magic XP is gained as characters use spells. XP gain is equivalent to the difficulty of the spell. Characters will also gain XP slowly if they are at max mana.
LanguageData.TM_MightXPDesc: Might XP is gained as characters use combat skills. XP gain is equivalent to the difficulty of the skill. Characters will also gain XP slowly if they are fully rested.
LanguageData.TM_CheckPointsForMoreInfo: Hover your mouse over skill attributes for more information on improvements.
LanguageData.TM_MagicLevelUp: {0} has gained a deeper understanding of magic and can train a new magic skill.
LanguageData.TM_MightLevelUp: {0} has grown stronger and is ready to develop a combat skill.
LanguageData.TM_MasterSpellLocked: Locked: learn {0} using a master scroll
LanguageData.TM_CommandMakePortalStockpileDesc: Creates a stockpile around the portal. When transporting items, the portal will move all items within this stockpile.
LanguageData.TM_PortalFailed: {0} failed when attempting to use the portal - if this persists, try deactivating the portal and resetting the target location.
LanguageData.TM_PortalDestinationInvalid: Invalid destination cell - destination must be a known, visible, and player occupied map.
LanguageData.TM_NoValidPortalDestination: No valid portal destination selected, exiting without assignment.
